actions.name: Teravolt
actions.description: Effect: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field. When using Fusion Bolt, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to also inflict @Affliction[nullified] 5 on one of the target's abilities. If the user uses Bolt Strike, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to inflict @Affliction[nullified] 5 on one of the target's abilities and have them lose -1 ACC stage for 5 Activations.
